hero.description: A decentralized voting platform powered by blockchain technology. Secure, transparent, and easy to use.

features.title: Create Events
features.description: Easily create voting events with customizable options and participant limits.

features.title: Secure Voting
features.description: Blockchain-based voting ensures transparency and prevents tampering.

features.title: Real-Time Results
features.description: View live voting progress with interactive graphs and instant updates.

howItWorks.title: View Results
howItWorks.description: Track live tally results and details.

funFacts: Blockchain technology ensures data immutability and tamper-resistance.
Did you know? The first known blockchain was created by Satoshi Nakamoto.
Voting on the blockchain reduces potential fraud by up to 90%.
EzyVote processes votes in an average of 10 seconds!

items.question: What is EzyVote?
items.answer: EzyVote is a blockchain-based voting platform designed for security and transparency.

items.question: How does EzyVote ensure security?
items.answer: Using blockchain technology, EzyVote guarantees votes are immutable and tamper-proof.

items.question: Can I use EzyVote for large scale elections?
items.answer: Currently, EzyVote is well-suited for smaller elections but can scale as needed.

items.question: Do participants need a crypto wallet?
items.answer: Yes, participants need to connect their crypto wallets for authentication and security.

header.title: About EzyVote
header.description: Revolutionizing small-scale voting with blockchain technology

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At EzyVote, our mission is to empower communities with a secure, transparent, and efficient platform for conducting small-scale elections. We leverage the power of blockchain technology to ensure every vote counts and every voice is heard.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.transparency: Transparency: Ensuring every step of the process is visible and verifiable.
values.security: Security: Protecting user data and election integrity with state-of-the-art blockchain technology.
values.inclusivity: Inclusivity: Making the platform accessible and easy to use for everyone.
values.innovation: Innovation: Constantly improving and adapting to meet the needs of our users.

header.title: Contact Us
header.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

qrCodeSection.title: Scan to Save Contact
qrCodeSection.description: Scan this QR code to save our contact details directly to your phone.
